extendedInfo.description: Can you believe PS Vita only sales for $187 with like new condition and TomTom 340tm only sales for $38 with like new condition? Believe me, I tried on Amazon Warehouse Deal, and I see "like new" condition is a really very new condition, even the film is still attached, the only thing I think is not so brand new is the box, but I don't care about the box, would you? Now I only buy "like new" stuff from Amazon since it is so cheap and the condition is so good!I must admit I am a greedy guy that I want to get an even cheaper price for those deals, that is why I developed this small app which can help me trace the price from Amazon Warehouse Deals. Try it, you will see how much you can save from it!!

reviews.title: excellent app
reviews.comment: must have app if you are looking for cheap deals from amazon warehouse like what i did for video games.
reviews.author: Nam Pham

reviews.title: Excellent deal tracker
reviews.comment: Must have for people who buy from Amazon warehouse
reviews.author: lipak prusty

reviews.title: GREAT APP!
reviews.comment: I was able to get call of duty black ops II for $30 what a steal! Great program from great developers definitely a helpful app.  If you are worried about using too much data, just use the wifi in your home.  This app can save you a lot of money if you know what you are looking for.
reviews.author: kelvin foung

reviews.title: Data Usage
reviews.comment: It uses huge amount of data every single day, in excess of 200 mb a day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inaccurate result
reviews.comment: When i search directly in Amazon warehouse deals, i see many more results...while with this app i only see 4 items
reviews.author: Edward Sudjatmiko
